# 瞬间来电

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shunjian-laidian
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shunjian-laidian
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shunjian-laidian
shunjian-laidian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shunjian-laidian
shunjian-laidian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
